flags.title: User-Contributed Project

guide.introduction: Our company is going to give money to those people who have had accidents that was not there fault and it is a no win no fee basis.
guide.introduction_rendered: Our company is going to give money to those people who have had accidents that was not there fault and it is a no win no fee basis.
guide.summary: This will accomplish giving money to people who have had accidents that have happend at work or at home that was not there fault.
guide.title: accident advice helpline
